mapper.insert: INSERT INTO eleme_order(tenant_id, tenant_code, branch_id, branch_code, address, created_at, active_at, deliver_fee, vip_delivery_fee_discount, deliver_time, description, invoice, book, online_paid, order_id, phone_list, shop_id, open_id, shop_name, day_sn, status, refund_status, user_id, total_price, original_price, consignee, delivery_geo, delivery_poi_address, invoiced, income, service_rate, service_fee, hongbao, package_fee, activity_total, shop_part, eleme_part, downgraded, secret_phone_expire_time, invoice_type, taxpayer_id, cold_box_fee, create_user_id, last_update_user_id, last_update_remark) VALUES(#{tenantId}, #{tenantCode}, #{branchId}, #{branchCode}, #{address}, #{createdAt}, #{activeAt}, #{deliverFee}, #{vipDeliveryFeeDiscount}, #{deliverTime}, #{description}, #{invoice}, #{book}, #{onlinePaid}, #{orderId}, #{phoneList}, #{shopId}, #{openId}, #{shopName}, #{daySn}, #{status}, #{refundStatus}, #{userId}, #{totalPrice}, #{originalPrice}, #{consignee}, #{deliveryGeo}, #{deliveryPoiAddress}, #{invoiced}, #{income}, #{serviceRate}, #{serviceFee}, #{hongbao}, #{packageFee}, #{activityTotal}, #{shopPart}, #{elemePart}, #{downgraded}, #{secretPhoneExpireTime}, #{invoiceType}, #{taxpayerId}, #{coldBoxFee}, #{createUserId}, #{lastUpdateUserId}, #{lastUpdateRemark})
mapper.update: UPDATE eleme_order SET tenant_id = #{tenantId}, tenant_code = #{tenantCode}, branch_id = #{branchId}, branch_code = #{branchCode}, address = #{address}, created_at = #{createdAt}, active_at = #{activeAt}, deliver_fee = #{deliverFee}, vip_delivery_fee_discount = #{vipDeliveryFeeDiscount}, deliver_time = #{deliverTime}, description = #{description}, invoice = #{invoice}, book = #{book}, online_paid = #{onlinePaid}, order_id = #{orderId}, phone_list = #{phoneList}, shop_id = #{shopId}, open_id = #{openId}, shop_name = #{shopName}, day_sn = #{daySn}, status = #{status}, refund_status = #{refundStatus}, user_id = #{userId}, total_price = #{totalPrice}, original_price = #{originalPrice}, consignee = #{consignee}, delivery_geo = #{deliveryGeo}, delivery_poi_address = #{deliveryPoiAddress}, invoiced = #{invoiced}, income = #{income}, service_rate = #{serviceRate}, service_fee = #{serviceFee}, hongbao = #{hongbao}, package_fee = #{packageFee}, activity_total = #{activityTotal}, shop_part = #{shopPart}, eleme_part = #{elemePart}, downgraded = #{downgraded}, secret_phone_expire_time = #{secretPhoneExpireTime}, invoice_type = #{invoiceType}, taxpayer_id = #{taxpayerId}, cold_box_fee = #{coldBoxFee}, create_user_id = #{createUserId}, last_update_user_id = #{lastUpdateUserId}, last_update_remark = #{lastUpdateRemark}, deleted = #{deleted} WHERE id = #{id}
